title: Noise Generator
description: Create custom colored noise with 8-band equalizer
howToUseText: Click PLAY and adjust the equalizer sliders to create a pleasing noise. Use presets for standard colored noise types like white, pink, brown, violet, blue, or grey noise.
equalizerDesc: Adjust 8-band equalizer to customize your noise
equalizerTooltip: Equalizer adjusts which pitches are louder or quieter. Think of it like adjusting bass/treble on a stereo - low frequencies (left) sound deeper, high frequencies (right) sound sharper.
presetTooltipWhite: White: All pitches equal (like TV static)
presetTooltipPink: Pink: More bass, sounds softer (like rain)
presetTooltipBrown: Brown: Deep rumble, mostly bass (like thunder)
settingsSavedDesc: Your noise settings have been copied to clipboard
audioDownloadedDesc: 30 seconds of {{color}} noise saved as WAV file
downloadFailedDesc: Unable to export audio. Please try again.
aboutColoredNoiseText1: Different colored noises emphasize different frequency ranges. White noise has equal energy across all frequencies, while pink noise emphasizes lower frequencies for a softer sound.
aboutColoredNoiseText2: Experiment with the equalizer to find the most pleasing and effective masking sound for your tinnitus.
